## Inter-rater Agreement (IRA) {#IRA}

- Agreement is defined as the degree to which scores/ratings are identical
- IRA indices, therefore, relate to the extent to which different raters assign the same precise value for each @gisevInterraterAgreementInterrater2013

:::{.callout title="Tests of inter-rater agreement"}

- Strictly IRA measures: Bland-Altman plots @gisevInterraterAgreementInterrater2013
- others have been used in the literature as measures of both IRA and IRR (eg, Cohen's kappa) @gisevInterraterAgreementInterrater2013
:::
